publicationStmt.p: This file was created for didactic purposes. It consists on an adaptation of the work developed within the Eighteenth-Century Poetry Archive, and it is shared under the same licence as required: CC-BY-SA

encodingDesc.p: Only a “ecep” specific atribute was kept, all the others were replaced with the semantic equivalent in the TEI namespace. E.g., ecep:reg was replaced with norm, and ecep:spe with orig.

editorialDecl.p: The text has been typographically modernized, but without any silent modernization of spelling, capitalization, or punctuation. The source of the text is given and all editorial interventions have been recorded in textual notes. Based on the electronic text originally produced by the TCP project, this ECPA text has been edited to conform to the recommendations found in Level 5 of the Best Practices for TEI in Libraries version 4.0.0.
